oai_dc:dc.dc:title: List of stores transferred to Lieutenant M.L. McConnell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This document lists two "unserviceable" cavalry horses being returned to the Quartermaster at Decatur, Alabama by Capt. G.W. Gorman, Co. I, 2nd Tenn. Cav. Regiment, USA. The Quartermaster is identified as Lt. M.L. McConnell of the 2nd Tenn. Cav. Regiment, USA.
